title: Book
body:
Welcome to our bookcase
What are you doing here?
[[We're trying to escape from the Home|1]]
[[we are looking for those who would like to join us|2]]

Fly you fools
but you will not get far
If you try escaping through the kitchen window, the toster will stop you
If you try going through the door, you will need a key
[[Tell me something about the Toster|11]]
[[Where can we find the key?|12]]

In the living room you will find a flip-flop
She loves meeting new people
Hair Dryer may also be interested in your quest
He always complains about boredom
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>

The Toster is a lovely kitchenware, but he's very stubborn
He can't stand anybody using a "but" while talking with him
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>

The key is hidden underneath the automobile's familiar
Search for it yourself! Be gone!
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>
